author: CBC News
title: What you need to know about COVID-19 in B.C. on April 22, 2020
description: B.C. has now seen 87 people die of COVID-19, and 1,724 have had confirmed infections with the novel coronavirus.
content:
THE LATEST:
  • Provincial health officer Dr. Bonnie Henry will give her daily update at 3 p.m. PT.
  • 1,724 cases of COVID-19 have been confirmed in B.C.
  • 87 people have died of their illness.
